title: The vacuum weighted Einstein field equations on pr-waves
abstract:
We classify solutions of the vacuum weighted Einstein field equations on
smooth metric measure spacetimes $(M,g,h\, dvol_g)$ of dimension 4, where the
underlying manifold $(M,g)$ is a $pr$-wave. We use this result to provide
examples of solutions with some special geometric properties.
  The gradient $\nabla h$ is lightlike or spacelike. In the first case, the
underlying manifold is a $pp$-wave. In the second case, the Ricci operator is
nilpotent. Moreover, $2$-step nilpotent solutions are also realized on
$pp$-waves.
